channel.title: Go on Last Known Good Configuration
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Last Known Good Configuration

item.title: Getting Going With Go Part I
item.description: After hearing a lot about the Go programming language and its similarity to C, I decided to finally get around to trying to learn it (I’m currently watching Brenna Martenson’s course on Frontend Masters, “Go for JavaScript Developers”). And since the best way to ensure you’ve actually learned a thing is to teach a thing, I decided to start this blog. So join me as I muddle through the early stages of learning a language.
